org.forgerock.cuppa

Class CuppaTestProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.cuppa.CuppaTestProvider

  • public final class CuppaTestProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows integrations to control Cuppa and provides access to its model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void filterStackTrace(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Modify a Throwable's stacktrace by removing any stack elements that are not relevant to a test.
      static TestBlock getRootTestBlock()
      Returns the test block that contains all user-defined tests and test blocks.
      static void runTests(Reporter reporter)
      Runs all the tests that have been loaded into the test framework.

    • Method Detail

      • runTests

        public static void runTests(Reporter reporter)
        Runs all the tests that have been loaded into the test framework.
        Parameters:
        reporter - A reporter to apprise of test outcomes.

      • getRootTestBlock

        public static TestBlock getRootTestBlock()
        Returns the test block that contains all user-defined tests and test blocks.
        Returns:
        The root test block.

      • filterStackTrace

        public static void filterStackTrace(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Modify a Throwable's stacktrace by removing any stack elements that are not relevant to a test. If the Throwable has a cause, it will also be modified. The modification is applied to all transitive causes.
        Parameters:
        throwable - a throwable to modify.
